The video shows the all time EPL scorers

Insatiable scorers!

The chart is implemented by D3. It shows number of goals the those players have scored during their playing time in the EPL. Those players might have played in more than one team in the EPL, but what is important is that they scored a lot of goals.

The chart is dynamic. If you hover over the bars, you will reveal the identity of the players.

Teams that have stayed within 8 best ranks

Top 1 scorer: Alan Shearer
Goals: 260
